bio: I am Neme. I am a web3/DeFi Educator and security intern. I train and onboard new users into web3 L2 ecosystem, emphasis on the optimism blockchain.
contributionDescription: I educate and onboard my African communities on Web 3, security and into using of the optimism l2 networks. I host events, webinars and crypto tech crunch in different African cities. RetroPGF will really facilitate me to get more hands and reaching more communities. I also contribute to fund upcoming projects in the ecosystem through gitcoin donation.
impactDescription: My contributions funded and onboard new end users and developers. It educated my African communities on Web 3, security and using the optimism l2 networks. It educated them through my events, webinars and crypto tech crunch in different African cities.
